title: 5.0 updated from 5rc1 can't delete files
body:
maybe i should'nt update a rc?


### expected behaviour
delete files in the webinterface by klicking x on the right

### actual behaviour
spinning icon foverer

on page reload you get a white page "waiting for host"

### steps to reproduce
klick x

### server configuration
operating system: ubuntu-server 12.04.1

web server: apache2

database: mysql

php version: php 5.3.10-1ubuntu3.6

owncloud version: 5.0

### client configuration
browser: chrome version 25.0.1364.172 m

operating system: windows 7

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
129mb
```
...
{"app":"php","message":"undefined variable: collectiontypes at \/var\/www\/owncloud\/lib\/public\/share.php#918","level":2,"time":1363759122}
```
